name: React Developer (Front End)
description:
Company Review:

We are a funded software startup based in California, focused on data analytics for computer vision. We are developing a unique edge-to-cloud based platform focused on integrating all forms of detection and analytics from enterprise video feeds. Our core development team is based in Russia but we work as a distributed team across multiple time zones. We are looking for team members who are energetic, excited about developing a new cloud service, and with a solid understanding of English.

This position is a remote work opportunity so location is not a qualifier. Preference for those on or near the Moscow Time Zone, but not a requirement for the right candidate.

Position Information:

Metapix is looking for a highly skilled computer programmer to grow with our dev team who is comfortable with front end programming. As a React Developer you will be responsible for developing and designing front end web architecture, ensuring the responsiveness of applications and working alongside graphic designers for web design features, among other duties.

This React Developer will be required to see out our project from conception to final product, requiring good organizational skills and attention to detail.

Developer Responsibilities:

  • Responsible for development of new, highly-responsive web-based user interface

  • Designing user interactions on web pages.

  • Ensuring responsiveness of applications.

  • Developing front-end website architecture.

  • Develop a flexible and well-structured front-end architecture, along with the APIs to support it

  • Work and collaborate with the rest of the engineering team

  • Learn and understand user interactions

Developer Requirements:

  • Degree in Computer Science.

  • Experience with REACT

  • Proficiency with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

  • Typescript

  • Experience with REST API's

  • Experience in working with GitLab (or similar)

  • Able to work remotely while remaining disciplined and structured.

  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills

  • Intermediate to Upper English language skills – verbal and written.
